about_the_game:
Here's a raw, beautiful woman's body.
Tie her up? Take her with you? Play with her? Or...
Pervy beauties who will listen to anything you say are waiting for you in the game.
A wide variety of adult toys, clothing, sizes and colors!
Have sex with her, torture her, or play with her in many other kinky ways!
A Hentaied game made by Hentais for Hentais!



Game description:

All characters in this game are over 18 years old.

This game is available in various languages.
Intuitive UI design and icons allow for easy operation.
Detailed adjustments can be made to achieve a kinky environment to your liking.

Physical representation that makes erotic expression more realistic.
Women's reactions and movements are like those of real human beings.

We packed it with situations that stimulate your Hentaied desires.
You can have sex and play with a woman who is unable to move!



Desktop version Controls:


W key = Forward
S key = Backward
A key = Move left
D key = Move right
Q key = Go down
E key = Go up


Left click = Accept, Touch
Hold right click = Viewpoint rotation
Scroll up/down = Move forward/backward
Hold scroll = Move up/down/left/right


Execute the following file to start DLC.
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\VR Hentai Simulation Desktop mode\vrhentai_desktop\hentai.exe

All persons appearing in this sexual content are 18 years of age or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
